moves.1. e4 c5 2. f4 Nc6 3. Nf3 d6: the GPA variation against the Sicilian: one of my favorite games...
moves.5... e5 6. g3: you might win a full tempo in development...
moves.8... g5 9. Be3: no sweat yet: after Ng4, Bf2...
moves.9... Ne5 10. O-O: Black has nothing: apart from being behind in development...
moves.10... Nfg4 11. Nxe5: after Nxe3, Nxf7: in a heartbeat...
moves.12... Nc4: the losing move: I rest my case...
